arm_group.description: Training in the course of the study

brief_summary.textblock:
A randomized, controlled trial to investigate the effects of a buteyko based remedial
      breathing therapy on children with asthma regarding to their symptoms, use of medication and
      lung function tests.

clinical_study.brief_title: Buteyko Based Remedial Breathing Therapy With Children With Asthma

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  signed informed consent of the parents

          -  age 6- 15 years

          -  information and consent of the consulting doctor

          -  levels of asthma therapy 1-3

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  participation in another study

intervention.description: Buteyko based remedial Breathing Therapy after Dr. Buteyko

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction of Betamimetics (-30%) at 3- and/or 6-month follow up
primary_outcome.time_frame: asthmaspezific parameters are measured before and after intervention as well as 3- and 6- month follow up

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Scores of the ACQ (Asthma Control Questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: parameters are measured before and after intervention as well as 3- and 6- month follow up

secondary_outcome.description: Scores of PAQLQ (Paediatric Asthma Quality of Life Questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: parameters are measured before and after intervention as well as 3- and 6- month follow up

secondary_outcome.description: Scores of the AFB (ARCIM Questionnaire) regarding to asthma symptoms of the last 3 month (AFB is not validated)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: parameters are measured before and after intervention as well as 3- and 6- month follow up
